1.title: The Centurion

episode of.title: World War II Tank Overhaul (TV Series 2007–2009)

1.plot: Two crews work on British designed Centurions. The first crew volunteers at the Imperial War Museum in Duxford, England with all the time, spare parts, and manpower they need.

2.title: The Elephant

episode of.title: World War II Tank Overhaul (TV Series 2007–2009)

2.plot: One of the largest tank destroyers ever built, the Elephant is possibly the rarest surviving tank from World War II. Only 90 were built and only 2 survive.

3.title: The M-24 Chaffee

episode of.title: World War II Tank Overhaul (TV Series 2007–2009)

3.plot: Joe Garbarino, CEO of Marin Sanitation, has a passion for collecting military vehicles, including arguably the best light tank of WWII, the M-24 Chaffee.

4.title: The BMP

episode of.title: World War II Tank Overhaul (TV Series 2007–2009)

4.plot: Greg Taylor, one of the world's most experienced tank restoration experts, has an impossible mission on his hands: to rebuild a BMP, a Cold War tank designed to protect soldiers from radioactive.

1.title: The A34 Comet

episode of.title: World War II Tank Overhaul (TV Series 2007–2009)

1.plot: The Isle of Wight Military Museum team of restorers take on the task of refurbishing a 1944-era World War II British Comet tank.

2.title: The Panther

episode of.title: World War II Tank Overhaul (TV Series 2007–2009)

2.plot: Jacques Littlefield labors to add a rare German V Panther to his collection of military vehicles. Recovered from a riverbed in Poland, the mangled hulk challenges his expert crew.

3.title: The M4 Sherman

episode of.title: World War II Tank Overhaul (TV Series 2007–2009)

3.plot: The Isle of Wight team attempts to pull off an unrivaled feat of restoration as they make one good tank out of two destroyed ones by rebuilding the damaged front quarter of a US M4 Sherman.

imdb.plot outline: Tank Overhaul invites you into a world where military enthusiasts, collectors, and restorers combine their know-how with 21st Century technology to restore the greatest battle tanks of all time to their former glory. Each episodes follows one tank's story, from the original salvage, to the rebuilding process, to the history behind the innovations that made each machine great.
imdb.title: World War II Tank Overhaul
plot: Tank Overhaul invites you into a world where military enthusiasts, collectors, and restorers combine their know-how with 21st Century technology to restore the greatest battle tanks of all time to their former glory.
